website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and weather-resistant with enough room to carry essential gear. Ogio's clutch pack has a clean design ideal for any outdoor activity.
pros: Ideal for trekking, camping and long haul travel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was highly recommended by ChaseOnTwoWheels. Couldn't be happier. Fits my 15" laptop perfectly and has a lot more space than you would think at first glance. Very comfortable. The sternum strap when adjusted correctly makes the bag feel like it's giving you a hug it's very comfortable. The black stripes down the face are actually a bunch of 'loops' which are great for strapping things to the outside when used with a clip. As I bought the bag this winter, I also used it a lot while snowboarding and can say that I was surprised by how water resistant it was.
customer_reviews.author: Brydon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag. Great comfort straps and extra cross chest ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof. Sturdy bag. Great comfort straps and extra cross chest clip. Got for my boyfriend for riding on his motorcycle. He has used multiple times on trips and grocery shopping, Its heald up great. The front can be tied together to make more aerodynamic while riding when the bag is near empty. I love this bag it's big enough to fit alot. BUT small enough I can wear it while riding passenger and not look goofy on my small 5'2 110lb frame. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Melissa miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Can fit my laptop and all my other school supplies. The padding feels great against my back even though I got some spine problems. It also never feels bulky. It's a great product if anyone wants a good backpack and if you use a bike then you sometimes forget it's there. It does come with a neat strap that goes across the chest so it doesn't go sliding off easily. Update: had for almost two months now and still no issues. It carries a lot of weight sometimes and no tears have shown. Padding still super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Common2

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This holds just enough stuff. I can fit an Xbox One and two controllers and the power supply in it. a gallon of milk and some other stuff from the grocery store. It's holding up good so far and I did spray it with a waterproofing spray to help with the rain as it's not waterproof to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Paul s Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is OK. The side pockets are very small and there could be better/more organization to the main compartment. The quality is good, it seems well constructed and should last for a while. I'll use it until I can find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a hubs for Father's Day, I am so pleased with it. Gambled a little because people said it was "small". The size is good, the price is good, quality is good. Totally recommend, it came super fast too which is always a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Solid pack, needs a little more zippered spaces
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid pack, but there is only one main compartment and the two side pouches are a little small. Would be better with another inner compartment when traveling, so you can quickly store wallet and phone and such in there and not have to fish to the bottom of the bag, but it is a minimal complaint. The bag is sturdy and rugged and comfortable to wear when walking distance with it loaded up with a laptop and other office essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Scootmcg

customer_reviews.title: You won't even notice you are wearing it while riding.
customer_reviews.text: This bag does not have many compartments but looks great and has a ton of space without being too bulky, when riding my bike I barely notice is there(sometimes I even forget I'm carrying it). Great quality, love the cords on the zippers and not sure what else to say, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality backpack. I am a motorcycle commuter and use this everyday to and from work. Living in Florida you ARE going to get rained on while riding at some point. I always keep a change of clothes and they never get wet when it does rain. The only thing that could of made this backpack better was if it had an easy access bottle holder somewhere. You can easily go on weekend beach trips with enough room to take anything you would need.
customer_reviews.author: Bella w.

customer_reviews.title: double zippers would be nice on side pockets
customer_reviews.text: so so bag zippers seem kinda cheap,needs some sort of organizer on the inside.double zippers would be nice on side pockets.but it is light and small for motrcycling.ok to put my lunch and coffee in maybe a sweat shirt ect.not worth 50 bucks.way to expensive
customer_reviews.author: dozer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack
customer_reviews.text: I like this backpack because it holds my 16" laptop with extended battery without complaint. I'm giving it four stars because I would like a little interior organization for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 years ago and it's still holding up, use it at work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop bag if you ride a scooter or motorcycle to work.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bringing my laptop with me on my bike. Not super roomy, but it's meant to be a slim, riding backpack. I like the color and material a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for off road adventures
customer_reviews.text: Great for my extended off road MC and at adventures. I ride a sport KTM atv and Enduro Husqvarna mc with no storage this holds plenty for a day long ride. Waters, food, tool kit, phone and room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the best “non-essential” purchase that I’ve made since I started riding.
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all but honestly... it’s true. A normal backpack, drawstring bag, etc. just won’t cut it. I carry, shoes, clothes, groceries (that’s right) and extra visor for night time riding as well. I’ve used it for 3 months now and I would buy another without hesitation if something were to happen it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Fit my riding jacket liners a 2 litre bottle, family size bag of doritos and a loaf of bread without smashing it. I do however wish it was a vibrant safety shade of orange rather than the dull brownish color it is..
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Back pack
customer_reviews.text: Seems alright but haven't used it yet. Doesn't look as strong as I hoped
customer_reviews.author: noland11

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had more pockets but then again I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more pockets but then again I knew what I was buying and it works really well. It's small profile doesn't catch wind when riding.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: might be a great bag. Just I dislike in the photo
customer_reviews.text: In the picture it seemed a bit larger than it actually was, went down half of my back and it didn't fit me, might be a great bag. Just I dislike in the photo, it shows a relatively large guy wearing it and was hoping it'd fit. I love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Horning

customer_reviews.title: Get one while you can
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these bags. They are great. Very durable, good design, perfect pocket layout. Too bad it looks like Ogio is discontinuing. Get thos bag while you can.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack if you don’t like to be organized
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack if you don’t like to be organized. It basically has three pockets. Looks great and it’s of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... much smaller than i expected but it is still pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's much smaller than i expected but it is still pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of clothes. Great for people with motorcycles. Lightweight and packs a lot
customer_reviews.author: Mendo

customer_reviews.title: Great simple bag for riding
customer_reviews.text: Works great for snowmobiling and very comfortable. Going to use it on the motorcycle too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material, does not provide enough protection for a laptop. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: ... is thinner than I expected but it's still a good looking
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is thinner than I expected but it's still a good looking bag
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice lightweight bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lightweight bag. It lacks a little space in the pocket area, but it's really comfortable and simplistic. The price tag is extremely nice considering it's a motorcycle worthy bag without the heavy price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and this bag carries just what i need ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying quite a bit of Ogio clothing and accessories lately. Good quality and this bag carries just what i need when riding to and from work.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing to the back and the eye
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality back pack... Lacks in organization but is a good medium sized bag. Very pleasing to the eye just needs a little more organization
customer_reviews.author: Captin awesome

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, bad color
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for when riding my motorcycle, only problem is the orange in the picture is different than the actual bag. The actual bag is more of a burnt orange.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag for its price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag for its price, Its easy to utilize all of the space as it doesn't have multiple zippers and pockets, its just one big pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is really an awesome bag and i love it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars 100%
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as Advertised...great product with a good price. Sturdy and well made. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Not much in the way of interior pockets but very solid amount of room and comfortable. Can't beat the price for the
customer_reviews.text: Very solid backpack. Not much in the way of interior pockets but very solid amount of room and comfortable. Can't beat the price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: William Digges

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Has kept my laptop dry in the snow so far. Looks Great!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, very light, I use to commute, short and long rides, I can carry all I need on it, extra clothes for example a laptop, etc... 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my motorcycle commute, fits snug and holds everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Katiebug

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag... It keeps everything close to me, it could be a little bigger to maybe fit some more stuff in, but it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brent Ecton

customer_reviews.title: Backpack works great. I took off one star because I think ...
customer_reviews.text: Backpack works great. I took off one star because I think it'd be better to have double zippers on the sides so I can zip up around my water bottles I like to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: the quality is very good, I recommend this Ítem
customer_reviews.text: the delivery was very fast, the product is same of the image, the quality is very good, I recommend this Ítem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your buck for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this for the price. When I take the mc to work I use this instead of my normal messenger bag. It's durable and the zippers are tough. Nice design where it opens from the top and has 2 big cavernous storage areas. The 2 side pockets are nice to carry small things. It's comfortable, doesn't blow around too much in the wind, and looks cool. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: James A., Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Fits great, the small two pouches on the side hold a lot of little things, knives, lighters, ponchos, can opener, space blanket, lighter fluid, etc. I use this when riding the dirt bike. Good to have for lpng rides.
customer_reviews.author: Backwell

customer_reviews.title: If you ride, look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Great back pack if you ride. Exactly whats needed, which is a big, open compartment. It 'fits' well, doesn't interfere (too much) with aerodynamics, and feels durable and well made. If you don't want to spend 150+ for the Mach series, but need a moto-appropriate pack for grocery getting, commuting etc.. look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty and zipper stuck
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how good this product is. When it arrived it looked like it had sat in a warehouse for a few years, it was covered in dust, like it really could use a wash. Unfortunately, the zipper also wouldn't work. I think this is more an issue with the seller than with the bag itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Wahle

customer_reviews.title: OGIO is great
customer_reviews.text: Grwat bag, nice style, structured, unlike most flimsy style packs.
customer_reviews.author: James Naylor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good look with 3 year lifespan under heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 20 months nearly daily. The inner lining is beginning to disintegrate, but everything else is solid. Never had trouble with zippers or anything else. Heavy rain will soak through top. Capacity is enough for laptop plus tupperwares.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

product_meta.title: OGIO International Clutch Pack
product_meta.description: Lightweight and weather-resistant with enough room to carry all your essential gear, OGIO's clutch pack has a clean design ideal for any outdoor activity. Whether you're trekking to the Park for an outdoor work session or trekking up a hill on a weekend day hike, the clutch pack has space for your necessary items. Your laptop fits securely in the padded laptop sleeve and 2 external pockets provide space for items like chargers, snacks or a digital camera. The large main compartment can fit any light outerwear, books, or gear you need for your chosen activities. Lightly padded shoulder straps and 2-way adjustable sternum strap allow you to comfortably carry this backpack no matter the journey. Available in a variety of color combinations with accents like aluminum zipper pulls, the clutch pack shows off the unique OGIO style - and your active, outdoor personality. Features: large main volume, 2 external pockets, padded laptop sleeve, 2 way adjustable sternum strap, aluminum zipper pulls. Specs: dimensions: 19" h x 11.5" W x 5.5" D, weight: 0.75 lbs., capacity: 1275 cubic inches, laptop pocket: 17"h x 11.5"W x 1.5"D
feature_bullets: Large main Volume with padded laptop sleeve
Dimensions: 19" H x 11.5" w x 5.5" D
